plugins.locationAlwaysAndWhenInUsePermission: Allow Floway to access your location to track your running sessions.
plugins.locationAlwaysPermission: Allow Floway to access your location in the background for accurate session tracking.
plugins.locationWhenInUsePermission: Allow Floway to access your location during active sessions.

plugins.faceIDPermission: Allow $(PRODUCT_NAME) to access your Face ID for secure authentication.
plugins.fingerprintPermission: Allow $(PRODUCT_NAME) to access your fingerprint for secure authentication.

infoPlist.NSLocationUsageDescription: Floway needs access to location when open to track your running sessions.
infoPlist.NSLocationWhenInUseUsageDescription: Floway uses your location during active running sessions to show your real-time route and performance stats.
infoPlist.NSLocationAlwaysAndWhenInUseUsageDescrip: Floway tracks your location in the background to ensure complete and accurate recording of your running sessions.
infoPlist.NSMicrophoneUsageDescription: Floway needs access to your microphone to record guided run sessions.
infoPlist.NSLocationAlwaysUsageDescription: Floway needs continuous access to your location to track running sessions that continue when the app is not in the foreground.
infoPlist.NSCameraUsageDescription: Floway needs access to your camera to take a profile picture.
infoPlist.NSPhotoLibraryUsageDescription: Floway needs access to your library to choose a profile picture.
infoPlist.NSPhotoLibraryAddUsageDescription: Floway needs to save photos to your library.
